meanings.definition: A strip of cloth or plastic with a person's name printed on it, typically sewn onto clothing.
meanings.sent1: I sewed the nametape onto my school uniform to make sure everyone knows it's mine.
meanings.sent2: The nametape on the back of his jacket helped the teacher identify whose it was.
meanings.sent3: The nametape on my backpack decided to go on an adventure and explore the school on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her nametape was like a tiny flag waving proudly on her shirt.
meanings.sent5: The bright nametape stood out in the sea of uniforms, making it easy to spot.

meanings.definition: A label or tag with a person's name on it, used for identification purposes.
meanings.sent1: The nametape on the suitcase ensured it wouldn't get lost at the airport.
meanings.sent2: She carefully wrote her name on the nametape before sticking it on her lunchbox.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the nametape and pretended to be someone else.
meanings.sent4: His nametape was like a secret code that only he could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nametape sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
